nodes.text: Named for its neon lights, the Neon Wonderland was a section of the Red Light Sector of the moon Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.
The Neon Wonderland appears as part of the Red Light Sector on Nar Shaddaa in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
